help-file.title: "MOONWELL"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <caster> & <victim> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Approximately 30 seconds or until its limit is reached Type of spell: Teleportation
"Moonwell" creates a magical pool of concentrated moisture and mist at the feet of the caster and the target and opens a conduit between those two points. This allows directed teleportation of large numbers of people between those locations.
